ee weda mahaththayage hati ehemayi sama dekatama mul thana dunne mudal walata.eka athakata sewaka mudal gewannath kama bima beth heth sapayannath yana wiyadama baluwama eeke waraddak mata dannam penne na.halawatha ayiya awith ee wenakota masa dekakatath kittu wela thibune eyama kiwwa widiyata sahenna aduwimak wela thiyenawa ee tikata.weda mahaththayata laksha ekayi anuwakuth ee weddi dila ahawarayilu ee weddi.me kathawa kiyala pahuwada thamayi ee ayiyage awasanawantha dawasa uda wune.

shri lankawe pashchath yudha wathawaranayata wisandumak lesa idiripath kala ugath padam ha prathisandhana komishan warthawe adangu nirdesha piliganna bawa oostreliyanu rajaya awadharanaya karayi.merata prathisandhanaya ha prathisanskarana katayuthu walata adalawa mema warthawa mangin paladayi yojana rasak idiripath kara thibenaathara uthure aarakshaka balakayan awama kirima abhyanthara washayen awathan wuwan sandaha aarakshawa sapayima menma madhya nidahasa sambandhayenda karunu dakwa thibima agaya karana bawa oostreliyanu widesha amathi kewin rud mahatha prakasha karayi.mulika nirikshana ha nirdesha 285 kin samanwitha ugath padam ha prathisandhana komishan warthawa prasiddhiyata path kirimata shri lanka rajaya piyawara gena thibena athara ee sambandhayen lokaye sama ratakma wishesha awadhanaya yomukara thibe.me athara oostreliyanu widesha amathiwaraya penwa denne ugath padam ha prathisandhana komishan warthawa mangin wishesha siddhin sambandhayen thawaduratath parikshana pawathwima pilibandawa karunu dakwa thibima ithama wadagath bawayi.
